id: scenario-value-scanner-adult-scenarios-educational-professional development for educators in care economy teaching
title: Professional development for educators in care economy teaching
description: Professional development for educators in care economy teaching
content:
Scenario: Professional development for educators in care economy teaching
    Given Sarah wants to bring care economy into classroom
    And she needs professional development support
    When Sarah seeks educator training
    Then the educational_elohim should provide professional development
    And training should help teachers integrate care economy into curriculum
    And it should respect existing teaching expertise
    And it should provide practical classroom strategies
    And Sarah should be equipped to teach care economy effectively
